table.name: gtm_campaign
table.description: This table contains campaign information for various purposes. Eg. Country of origin information collected from suppliers.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: GTM_CAMPAIGN_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM campaign.

columns.name: GTM_CAMPAIGN_XID
columns.description: The external identifier XID for the GTM campaign.

columns.name: GTM_CAMPAIGN_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM campaign type.

columns.name: PERSPECTIVE
columns.description: Specifies from whom the campaign information is being collected. Values are S(for SUPPLIER) or C(for CUSTOMER).

columns.name: CAMPAIGN_NAME
columns.description: The descriptive name given to the campaign.

columns.name: CAMPAIGN_PURPOSE
columns.description: Provides details about the purpose of the campaign.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_REFERENCE_CODE
columns.description: Code that is externally used to identify the campaign.

columns.name: GTM_TRADE_AGREEMENT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM trade agreement.

columns.name: GTM_PROD_CLASS_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM product classification type.

columns.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
columns.description: The start date of the campaign.

columns.name: EXPIRATION_DATE
columns.description: The end date of the campaign.

columns.name: REM_DURATION
columns.description: The duration in which a reminder will be sent to the supplier.

columns.name: REM_DURATION_BASE
columns.description: The reminder duration in base units.

columns.name: REM_DURATION_GID
columns.description: The GID for the reminder duration related to the GTM campaign.

columns.name: INDICATOR
columns.description: Marks the condition or state of the GTM campaign using colors.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED1_ICON_GID
columns.description: Marks the condition or state of the GTM campaign using images. It is a foreign key reference to ICON table.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED2_ICON_GID
columns.description: Marks the condition or state of the GTM campaign using images. It is a foreign key reference to ICON table.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED3_ICON_GID
columns.description: Marks the condition or state of the GTM campaign using images. It is a foreign key reference to ICON table.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED4_ICON_GID
columns.description: Marks the condition or state of the GTM campaign using images. It is a foreign key reference to ICON table.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED5_ICON_GID
columns.description: Marks the condition or state of the GTM campaign using images. It is a foreign key reference to ICON table.

columns.name: MARKED_FOR_PURGE
columns.description: Indicates if the GTM campaign has been marked to be purged.
